careers.careerDescription:
We give life to the new amazin technological ideas!

We are searching for an explorer, someone brave, heroes and teammates, who are going to help us create flawles world under the surface of web sites, aplications and softwares
careers.somethingElseDescritption: Never mind, contact us despite that, Maybe you are the one who we need. You've got the chance to convince us.

info.heading: Projects
info.description: We work with start-ups as well as with well known brands. We create complete software solutions, from mobile phone aplications, web aplications to home controling systems and IOT.

info.heading: Team
info.description:
Qest is full with experienced profesionals who'll help juniors to get to the top. We are constantly trying to improve our code and outcome.

We are learning one from the other, but we can use interesting meetups and conferences
